bill.title: Kemper County; authorize creation of the Kemper County Natural Gas District.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Kemper County, Mississippi, To Create And Participate In The Kemper County Natural Gas District; To Establish A Board Of Commissioners Of The District; To Provide For The Membership And Terms Of Office For The Commission's Board Of Directors; To Authorize The Commission To Construct And Operate A Natural Gas Transmission And Distribution System And To Prescribe Other Powers And Duties Of The Commission; To Authorize The Issuance Of Revenue Bonds To Construct The Natural Gas Transmission And Distribution System; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Local and Private Legislation
